answers.answer: You posted on the type 2 diabetes forum. Try the heart forums

question: A family member has been told her heart disease is too extensive for them to go on Dialysis.  This person currently has her second kidney transplant.  This is a new heart condition.  Should that really prevent her from going on dialysis.  The transplant is in year 6 and not doing well.
title: DIABETICS WITH HEART DISEASE
